document_data.mainbody:
uphadora Greatquill was a writer and anthropologist author of One Foot, Two Feet, Well Met, Well Meet, published some years before the late 15 century DR.
Euphadoras book, One Foot, Two Feet, Well Met, Well Meet, was a volume that collected, recorded, and archived hin childrens rhymes and mnemonics. This book was quite popular and by the , its copies were found throughout the Western Heartlands, the Sword Coast, and the city of Baldurs Gate.
